å­ç»„ä»¶ target.vue
<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {

    }
  },
  props: {
    href: String,
    name: String,
    description: String,
    color: String,
    language: String,
    star: String
  },
  methods: {
    setDotColor: function() {
      this.$refs.dot.style.backgroundColor = this.color;
    }
  },
  mounted: function() {
    this.setDotColor();
  }
}
</script>
